Here is the list of astrological signs and their scores on a scale from 1-10 at $line:
1. Aries - 8 - Natural-born leaders, Aries tend to be bold and confident, but can also be impulsive.
2. Taurus - 7 - Practical and dependable, Tauruses are often steady and reliable, but can be stubborn.
3. Gemini - 9 - Quick-witted and adaptable, Geminis are naturally curious and love to learn, but can be scattered.
4. Cancer - 6 - Emotional and nurturing, Cancers care deeply about others, but can be overly sensitive.
5. Leo - 8 - Confident and charismatic, Leos are natural performers who crave attention, but can also be arrogant.
6. Virgo - 7 - Analytical and hardworking, Virgos are detail-oriented and practical, but can be perfectionistic.
7. Libra - 9 - Diplomatic and social, Librans value harmony and balance, but can be indecisive.
8. Scorpio - 5 - Intense and passionate, Scorpions are private and perceptive, but can also be secretive and moody.
9. Sagittarius - 7 - Adventurous and optimistic, Sagittarians are freedom-loving and enthusiastic, but can be reckless.
10. Capricorn - 6 - Disciplined and ambitious, Capricorns are responsible and practical, but can be overly critical.
11. Aquarius - 8 - Humanitarian and independent, Aquarians are innovative and unconventional, but can be detached.
12. Pisces - 4 - Empathetic and imaginative, Pisces are compassionate and dreamy, but can be scattered and impractical.
Note: The scores are subjective and based on general astrological characteristics associated with each sign.
